title: FrameworkPatcherV2 Documentation
excerpt: Automated Android framework patching system for modifying core framework JAR files.

content.introduction: FrameworkPatcherV2 is an advanced automated Android framework patching system that modifies core framework JAR files (framework.jar, services.jar, miui-services.jar) to enable advanced features and bypass system restrictions. It generates flashable modules compatible with Magisk, KernelSU, and SUFS root solutions.

sections.title: Purpose and Scope
content: FrameworkPatcherV2 automates the complex process of decompiling, patching, and recompiling Android framework JAR files to apply user-selected modifications. The system is designed to maintain compatibility across multiple Android versions while providing powerful customization capabilities.
This tool is essential for Android enthusiasts and developers who need to modify system behavior without manually editing framework files.
list: Signature verification bypass for installing modified APKs
MIUI notification delay fixes for China ROM devices
Secure flag removal for screenshot/recording support
Play Integrity Fix integration via Kaorios Toolbox

sections.title: Supported Platforms
content: FrameworkPatcherV2 supports a wide range of Android versions and root solutions, ensuring broad compatibility across devices.
list: Android 13 (API 33)
Android 14 (API 34)
Android 15 (API 35)
Android 16 (API 36)
Root Solutions: Magisk, KernelSU, SUFS

sections.title: System Architecture
content: The system implements a multi-tier architecture separating user interfaces, orchestration, and core patching logic. This modular design ensures maintainability and extensibility.
list: Interface Layer: Four distinct user-facing entry points for device info and feature selection
Orchestration Layer: GitHub Actions workflows for environment setup and execution
Core Patching Engine: Shell scripts implementing the decompile-patch-recompile pipeline
External Tools: Third-party utilities (apktool, d8) invoked through wrapper functions
Output: Flashable module packages distributed via GitHub Releases

sections.title: Patching Pipeline
content: The core patching process follows a five-stage pipeline that transforms raw JAR files into patched modules.
list: Download & Validation: Supports direct URLs and Google Drive links with automatic size validation
Decompilation: Uses apktool to convert JAR files to editable Smali code
Patching: Applies feature-specific Smali modifications across target classes
Recompilation: Rebuilds JAR files from modified Smali code
Optimization: Runs d8 DEX optimizer for better runtime performance
Module Creation: Packages patched JARs into MMT-Extended module structure

sections.title: Available Features
content: FrameworkPatcherV2 provides four primary patching features with version-specific availability.
list: Core Patch: Fully disables signature verification for system apps
China Notification Fix: Resolves notification issues on CN ROMs
Disable Flag Secure: Allows screenshots in apps that normally block them
Play Integrity Fix: Integrates Kaorios Toolbox for hardware attestation bypass
